content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello, Yi-Nuo Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Duisburg to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's discuss the rental price. What is your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I'm a student so I'm on a tight budget. I was thinking of around 400 Euros per month including all the utility bills. I understand that the apartment is in a great location and it's newly built, but 400 euros should be a fair price for a student apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 400 Euros per month is much lower than my expectations for this apartment. It's a very competitive price for the location and the quality of the apartment. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the value of the property. Would you be willing to pay more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Could you tell me why you think 400 euros is too low for this apartment? I understand that the location is great and the apartment is newly built, but as a student, I have to consider my budget. I'm willing to pay a reasonable price, but I need to know why your asking price is fair.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Certainly. The location of this apartment is prime, situated in the heart of the city center, close to all amenities such as supermarkets, public transportation, and other essential services. The apartment itself is brand new, with modern fixtures and fittings, and high-quality materials used throughout. The one-bedroom layout is designed to be both functional and comfortable, making it an ideal living space for a student or young professional. Given the desirability of the location and the standard of the apartment, I believe a fair rental price would be closer to 600 Euros per month. This reflects the market value for similar properties in the area and the investment I've made in providing a high-quality living environment for my tenants.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for explaining that to me. I understand that the location and quality of the apartment justify a higher price. However, as a student, I'm on a tight budget. Could we find a middle ground? Maybe 500 euros per month, including all the utility bills? I think this would be a fair price for both of us.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of 500 Euros per month is more in line with what I had in mind. It's still lower than my initial expectation, but considering your student status and the importance of finding a suitable and affordable place to live, I'm willing to negotiate. Would you be willing to pay a security deposit equivalent to one month's rent to secure the apartment? This is a standard practice in Germany to protect the landlord in case of any damages or unpaid rent.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for working with me on the price. I agree to the price of 500 euros per month, including all the utility bills. I am also willing to pay a security deposit of 500 euros. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
